14 namespace ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.App

20  public abstract class GameOptions : BaseOptions, IMatchConfig
21  {
22  // Number of board rows
23  private readonly int rows;
24 
25  // Number of board cols
26  private readonly int cols;
27 
28  // Number of pieces in sequence for winning the game
29  private readonly int winSequence;
30 
31  // Number of initial round pieces per player
32  private readonly int roundPiecesPerPlayer;
33 
34  // Number of initial square pieces per player
35  private readonly int squarePiecesPerPlayer;
36 
37  // Time limit for thinking in milliseconds
38  private readonly int timeLimitMillis;
39 
40  // Minimum apparent move time in milliseconds
41  private readonly int minMoveTimeMillis;
42 
43  // Thinker listeners
44  private readonly IEnumerable<string> thinkerListeners;
45 
46  // Match listeners
47  private readonly IEnumerable<string> matchListeners;

75  public GameOptions(
76  int rows, int cols, int winSequence,
77  int roundPiecesPerPlayer, int squarePiecesPerPlayer,
78  int timeLimitMillis, int minMoveTimeMillis,
79  IEnumerable<string> thinkerListeners,
80  IEnumerable<string> matchListeners,
81  IEnumerable<string> assemblies, bool debugMode)
82  : base(assemblies, debugMode)
83  {
84  this.rows = rows;
85  this.cols = cols;
86  this.winSequence = winSequence;
87  this.roundPiecesPerPlayer = roundPiecesPerPlayer;
88  this.squarePiecesPerPlayer = squarePiecesPerPlayer;
89  this.timeLimitMillis = timeLimitMillis;
90  this.minMoveTimeMillis = minMoveTimeMillis;
91  this.thinkerListeners = thinkerListeners;
92  this.matchListeners = matchListeners;
93  }
94 
98  [Option('r', "rows", Default = 6,
99  HelpText = "Number of rows in game board")]
100  public int Rows => rows;
101 
105  [Option('c', "cols", Default = 7,
106  HelpText = "Number of columns in game board")]
107  public int Cols => cols;
108 
112  [Option('w', "win-sequence", Default = 4,
113  HelpText = "How many pieces in sequence to win")]
114  public int WinSequence => winSequence;
115 
119  [Option('o', "round-pieces", Default = 10,
120  HelpText = "Number of initial round pieces per player")]
121  public int RoundPiecesPerPlayer => roundPiecesPerPlayer;
122 
126  [Option('s', "square-pieces", Default = 11,
127  HelpText = "Number of initial square pieces per player")]
128  public int SquarePiecesPerPlayer => squarePiecesPerPlayer;
129 
133  [Option('t', "time-limit", Default = 3600000,
134  HelpText = "Time limit (ms) for making move")]
135  public int TimeLimitMillis => timeLimitMillis;
136 
143  public float TimeLimitSeconds => timeLimitMillis / 1000.0f;
144 
148  [Option('m', "min-time", Default = 0,
149  HelpText = "Minimum time (ms) between moves")]
150  public int MinMoveTimeMillis => minMoveTimeMillis;
151 
158  public float MinMoveTimeSeconds => minMoveTimeMillis / 1000.0f;
159 
163  [Option("thinker-listeners",
164  Default = new string[] {
165  "ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.App.SimpleRenderingListener" },
166  HelpText = "Thinker event listeners (space separated)")]
167  public virtual IEnumerable<string> ThinkerListeners => thinkerListeners;
168 
172  [Option("match-listeners",
173  Default = new string[] {
174  "ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.App.SimpleRenderingListener" },
175  HelpText = "Match event listeners (space separated)")]
176  public virtual IEnumerable<string> MatchListeners => matchListeners;

181  public abstract IEnumerable<IThinkerPrototype> ThinkerPrototypes

183  get;
184  }
